root.name: The Jetsons: Cogswell's Caper
root.description: OverviewThrough 13 levels of platforming you control George Jetson, who will consult with his family (including his dog Astro) as to how to prevent his boss from destroying the planet. Cogswell is motivated by both greed and the pursuit of ever higher profits for his cog factory.Critical ReceptionWhen the NES version was released Electronic Gaming Monthly issued the following scores, 7,8,7,7 adding, "...one of the better 8-bit titles I've seen in a while. The graphics are very good and best of all there is a lot to do in the game".
